DOC.brief_summary: AIM : Strengthening sensorimotor training ( e.g aim improve balance ) widely use rehabilitation . There little knowledge best way combine strengthen sensorimotor training . Therefore , investigator want evaluate two type combination healthy participant . Interventions : - Group A : 1 . ) warm-up ; 2 . ) sensorimotor training ; 3 . ) strength training ( nine session four week ) - Group B : 1 . ) warm-up ; 2 . ) one strengthen exercise , follow sensorimotor exercise , alternate ( nine session four week ) Tests ( Before first train four week ) : - isokinetic test knee extensor flexor ( 60째/s ; 120째/s ; 180째/s ; 240째/s . ) - squat jump countermovement jump - static balance test unstable underground ( measure accelerometer ) - dynamic balance : star excursion balance test , ( ) stable ground , ( b ) unstable ground . Balance test perform ( c ) recover state ( ) fatigue ( i.e . fatigue exercise ) . Hypotheses 1 . Group B ( alternate sensorimotor strength exercise ) improve balance test Group A ( sensorimotor first , strength afterwards ) . 2 . Group B improve countermovement jump Group A . 3 . There differences improvement strength , power squat jump test two group .
DOC.criteria: Able perform strength sensorimotor training At least 18 year old Injury allow train test Illness allow train test Pregnancy Pain exercise
